item.description:

rip4d (+10/-200) Davidi2 (+200/-200) 13 o hey dere sexeh - mscp In topic August 25, 2012, 11:21:31 PM

LOL
[/quote]thx for the rep

OT - No idea why it’s back. Tom probably was exploring something? Dat nostagia though getting 100 rep from my davidscape topic…

To answer:

[12/8/2013 2:17:46 AM] Tom: oh that
[12/8/2013 2:17:47 AM] Tom: yeh thats me
[12/8/2013 2:17:53 AM] Tom: im snooping on peoples rep logs
[12/8/2013 2:17:59 AM] Tom: so i reenabled the karma logging system

Hey guys, remember this:
https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,539087.msg3944930.html#msg3944930
Still no one believes that the IP isn’t matched to mine.

Edit: my first 4 reps lol

[quote]
1337 Runescaper 24 (+10/-10) sk8rdude461 (+10/-103) -1 Fucking idiot - mscp In topic January 16, 2011, 02:34:44 AM
Evocation (+10/-17) sk8rdude461 (+10/-103) 1 rep ++ 20 rep - mscp In topic January 01, 2011, 09:32:57 PM

laurent 248 (+10/-200) sk8rdude461 (+10/-103) 5 Nice explained questions. its nice to help ppl like you! - mscp In topic January 01, 2011, 03:06:36 PM

stfu “I can’t get rep, can anyone rep me and test?”
